# tf.losses.get_losses

``` python
get_losses(
    scope=None,
    loss_collection=tf.GraphKeys.LOSSES
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/ops/losses/util.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/ops/losses/util.py).

Gets the list of losses from the loss_collection.

#### Args:

* <b>`scope`</b>: An optional scope name for filtering the losses to return.
* <b>`loss_collection`</b>: Optional losses collection.


#### Returns:

a list of loss tensors.
